org.apache.flink.queryablestate.client.proxy

类 KvStateClientProxyImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.queryablestate.network.AbstractServerBase<KvStateRequest,KvStateResponse>
      • org.apache.flink.queryablestate.client.proxy.KvStateClientProxyImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    KvStateClientProxy, KvStateServer

    @Internal
public class KvStateClientProxyImpl
extends AbstractServerBase<KvStateRequest,KvStateResponse>
implements KvStateClientProxy
    The default implementation of the KvStateClientProxy.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • KvStateClientProxyImpl

        public KvStateClientProxyImpl(java.net.InetAddress bindAddress,
                              java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Integer> bindPortIterator,
                              java.lang.Integer numEventLoopThreads,
                              java.lang.Integer numQueryThreads,
                              KvStateRequestStats stats)
        Creates the Queryable State Client Proxy.

        The server is instantiated using reflection by the QueryableStateUtils.createKvStateClientProxy(InetAddress, Iterator, int, int, KvStateRequestStats).

        The server needs to be started via start() in order to bind to the configured bind address.

        参数:
        bindAddress - the address to listen to.
        bindPortIterator - the port range to try to bind to.
        numEventLoopThreads - number of event loop threads.
        numQueryThreads - number of query threads.
        stats - the statistics collector.

      • updateJobManager

        public void updateJobManager(java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ActorGateway> leadingJobManager)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: KvStateClientProxy
        Updates the active Job Manager in case of change.

        This is useful in settings where high-availability is enabled and a failed Job Manager is replaced by a new one.

        IMPORTANT: this method may be called by a different thread than the KvStateClientProxy.getJobManagerFuture().

        指定者:
        updateJobManager 在接口中 KvStateClientProxy
        参数:
        leadingJobManager - the currently leading job manager.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getJobManagerFuture

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ActorGateway> getJobManagerFuture()
        从接口复制的说明: KvStateClientProxy
        Retrieves a future containing the currently leading Job Manager.

        IMPORTANT: this method may be called by a different thread than the KvStateClientProxy.updateJobManager(CompletableFuture).

        指定者:
        getJobManagerFuture 在接口中 KvStateClientProxy
        返回:
        A CompletableFuture containing the currently active Job Manager.
